document.full_text: mattel inc, after waging a seven-year legal war against a tiny california company, swallowed a surprise defeat on thursday after a u.s. jury decided that mga entertainment inc is the rightful owner of the once-billion dollar line of pouty-lipped bratz dolls.
document.title: mattel handed stunning reversal in bratz case
lines_and_colors: mattel inc, after waging a seven-year legal war against a tiny california company, swallowed a surprise defeat on thursday after a u.s. jury decided that mga entertainment inc is the rightful owner of the once-billion dollar line of pouty-lipped bratz dolls.
